Title: The Nuclear Age.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=p0EMAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: From Library Journal : Brilliant nuclear detonations and rising silver Titans have plagued William's dreams since his childhood during the Cuban missile crisis, when he fashioned a fallout shelter from the family ping-pong table. Thirty years later his fear has mushroomed into blinding paranoia, and when his wife announces she is leaving, he laces a hole in the backyard with dynamite, places her in it, and prepares to blow her up..
